key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks due to ongoing disputes and complex regulatory environments
Market and financial risks from high debt levels and exposure to real estate and investment market fluctuations
Operational risks related to dependence on technology providers and cybersecurity concerns
controversies: Legal disputes such as *Jones et al. v. ORIX USA Corporation* and *Thompson v. ORIX USA Corp.*
Scrutiny over environmental impact despite renewable energy focus
environmental_issues: Environmental impact of operations and investments, despite renewable energy initiatives
social_issues: Promoting gender diversity and achieving 'Eruboshi (3 star)' certification for workplace equality
governance_issues: Need for robust governance and risk management practices highlighted by legal disputes

sources.title: ICC Imposes Sanction of IDR 1 Billion on Orix Corporation
sources.snippet: Jakarta, 3 May 2021 - Indonesia Competition Commission (ICC) imposed a sanction on Orix Corporation for delayed notification of the acquisition of PT Sinar Mitra Sepadan Finance. The Commission Council in its today's Commission Council Hearing for the Reading out of Decision imposed a fine of IDR1,000,000,000 (one billion rupiah) on Orix Corporation for such violation.
